name: First assignment
body:
### TU: Numerical simulations - First assignment

This page contains my (T. Ng. H.) first assignment, which is a CV generated by using markdown, pandoc and html. Sources that I have used to construct this CV are:

- Valentino Aluigi's blog to create the \" Contact \" box \( http://bitlyfied.com/2013/03/14/markdown-cv/#comments \)
- Christophe-Marie Duquesne's blog that provides the basic style ( http://blog.chmd.fr/editing-a-cv-in-markdown-with-pandoc.html).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
